reshared_post.text:
üåç We‚Äôre proud to announce the launch of our AI for Climate Resilience Program.

AI already powers everything we do at Klarna ‚Äî and now we‚Äôre turning that same expertise toward the front lines of climate change. We take pride in our legacy as a climate leader, and we‚Äôre committed to driving positive change for the future. The AI for Climate Resilience Program will support pioneering projects that harness artificial intelligence to help climate-vulnerable communities adapt and thrive.

This is technology in service of both people and the planet.

This program will support local, practical, and community-owned solutions. From strengthening food security and improving health systems to building coastal resilience in the face of climate change.

What‚Äôs on offer:
üí∏ Grants of up to $300,000
üßë‚Äçüéì Mentorship, training, and a supportive community of practice

We encourage applications from organizations working to reduce vulnerability of local communities to climate-related risks in low- and middle-income countries. We welcome early stage applications as well, from teams that need support in developing technical details further. Whether you‚Äôre using AI to support smallholder farmers, build early warning systems, or translate complex risk data into community action plans, we want to hear from you!

Find out more about the program and apply here üëâ https://lnkd.in/d3tFWFHJ

We‚Äôve seen AI change how we bank, shop, and even write.
But can it help us survive a changing climate?

A few weeks ago Klarna in collaboration with Milkywire launched the AI for Climate Resilience Program to support innovators using AI to help vulnerable communities thrive

From food security and health systems to coastal resilience we are looking for practical community-driven solutions
üí∏ Grants up to $300,000
üß† Mentorship training and a global support network

There is still time to apply
Deadline is August 31 2025

Today we launched the AI for Climate Resilience Program to support organizations using AI to help communities facing significant climate risks. This program is not about philanthropy, but about making practical, forward-looking investments.

We‚Äôre offering up to $300K in funding, mentorship, and community to projects in low- and middle-income countries tackling real-world climate risks.

If you know of an organization working on climate challenges with AI, feel free to refer them to us.

Genuinely proud and happy to see our AI for Climate Resilience Program go live today! 

Complementing our impact-focused work on climate mitigation, this program aims to support innovative solutions driving climate resilience. 

If you work in this space, take a look and consider applying. 

If you don't, please share with your friends who do üôÉ

author.headline: Head of Climate and Environment at Klarna

reshared_post.text:
Happy to share Klarna‚Äôs¬†AI for Climate Resilience Program¬†‚Äî proud to be part of the amazing team behind it.¬†
At Klarna, AI isn‚Äôt just about smarter shopping experiences ‚Äî we‚Äôre using it to tackle some of the world‚Äôs biggest challenges. From helping people make more conscious choices, to now supporting climate-vulnerable communities. Read more about it below and apply here:¬†https://lnkd.in/dStYY9vq.

author.name: Alexandra Colac
author.headline: Sustainability, Circularity, Social and Environmental Impact in Value Chains

reshared_post.text:
üåç Klarna is putting AI to work for people and the planet. Milkywire is proud to help make it happen.

The AI for Climate Resilience Program is now open for applications! It‚Äôs designed to help communities on the front lines of climate change strengthen their ability to adapt and build long term resilience. The program will fund practical, community-owned solutions ‚Äî from improving food security to coastal resilience. Applications are open to projects that use AI in responsible, locally relevant ways to reduce climate risks and improve lives in low- and middle-income countries.

Thank you Klarna!

#Sustainability #ClimateTech #AIforGood

Proud to be part of this important initiative! Excited to see how AI can support climate resilience in communities that are most affected. Looking forward to the impact this program will help create üåè.  Apply here: https://lnkd.in/dStYY9vq
